rules.natural: Either the brewery loses certification, or the brewery passes inspection, or if there is no government audit, then the brewery has a product recall.
The brewery's customer complaints increase or the brewery's sales decrease.
Whenever the brewery's sales decrease, it follows that the brewery does not lose certification.
Under the condition that the brewery's quality control fails, if the brewery's customer complaints increase, then the brewery's market share decreases.
Either the brewery's quality control fails or the brewery has production issues.
If the brewery has production issues, then whenever the brewery's customer complaints increase, the brewery's market share decreases.
Provided that the brewery faces competition, then if the brewery's brand value decreases, the brewery's reputation is damaged.
If there is a new entrant in the beer market, then the brewery faces competition.
Either there is a new entrant in the beer market or a major brewery undergoes competitor expansion.
The brewery is certified organic or the brewery uses sustainable methods.
Under the condition that a major brewery undergoes competitor expansion, there is market saturation in the beer industry.
Whenever a merger is proposed between the brewery and a competitor, there is an antitrust investigation of the merger.
If a merger is proposed between the brewery and a competitor, then it is not the case that there is regulatory approval for the merger.
Either a merger is proposed between the brewery and a competitor, or if there is market saturation in the beer industry, then the brewery faces competition.
Provided that there is an antitrust investigation of the merger, then there is regulatory approval for the merger.
If the brewery uses sustainable methods, then the brewery does not use pesticide.
Whenever the brewery receives a fine, the brewery's license is suspended.
If the brewery's license is suspended, then the brewery violates regulations.
Provided that the brewery has a product recall, it is not the case that the brewery has contaminated product.
Provided that it is not the case that if the brewery is certified organic, then the brewery does not use pesticide, the brewery receives a fine.

Whenever it is not the case that if it is not the case that provided that the brewery is certified organic, the brewery does not use pesticide, then the brewery violates regulations, the brewery's brand value decreases.

If it is not the case that if it is not the case that under the condition that the brewery is certified organic, the brewery does not use pesticide, then the brewery violates regulations, then it is not the case that the brewery's reputation is damaged.
Provided that there is no government audit, the brewery uses pesticide.
If there is no government audit, then the brewery has contaminated product.
